name: Legends of Black Thunder
description:
Game about a cat named Black Thunder that eats fish while being chased by ever increasing pack of dogs.

Controls

Arrow keys -- moves the player
b -- drops a bone
q -- quits the game
Enter -- skips the intro

Gameplay
  • Collect all the fishes to clear the level.
  • Each level the number of dogs increases.
  • There are different types of dogs.
  • Getting caught by a dog or getting hungry kills you.
  • You get "cat #" of lives before game over.
  • Cat speed changes with hunger.
  • Lightning bolt power-up makes you go fast and pauses hunger.
  • Drop a bone to stop a dog in its track for a short time.
  • Boss level every 5 levels.
  • Learn the dynamics to overcome the challenges!
